content_app.tests package

Submodules

content_app.tests.tests_offers module

class content_app.tests.tests_offers.General(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

General setup class for creating reusable test instances of users, profiles, tokens, and offers.

setUp()

Creates a business user, business profile, and an offer with associated offer details. Configures the client with an authorization token for the business user.

class content_app.tests.tests_offers.OfferDetailsTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Tests for OfferDetails endpoints, focusing on retrieving details and verifying responses.

Attributes:

CREATE_DATA (dict): Default data for creating offer details.

CREATE_DATA = {'delivery_time_in_days': 6, 'features': ['feature1', 'feature2'], 'price': '100.00', 'revisions': 4, 'title': 'detailstest'}
setUp()

Inherits the general setup for creating test data.

test_get_offerdetails_detail_ok()

Tests retrieval of specific offer details.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • ‘url’ key not present in response data.

test_get_offerdetails_list_ok()

Tests retrieval of the list of offer details.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

class content_app.tests.tests_offers.OfferTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Tests for Offer endpoints, including creating, updating, retrieving, and filtering offers.

Attributes:

QUERY_PARAMS (dict): Query parameters for filtering offers. CREATE_DATA (dict): Default data for creating offers and their details. PATCH_DATA (dict): Data for updating offer fields.

CREATE_DATA = {'description': 'Ein umfassendes Grafikdesign-Paket für Unternehmen.', 'details': [{'delivery_time_in_days': 6, 'features': ['feature1', 'feature2'], 'offer_type': 'basic', 'price': '100.00', 'revisions': 4, 'title': 'detailstest'}, {'delivery_time_in_days': 6, 'features': ['feature1', 'feature2'], 'offer_type': 'standard', 'price': '100.00', 'revisions': 4, 'title': 'detailstest'}, {'delivery_time_in_days': 6, 'features': ['feature1', 'feature2'], 'offer_type': 'premium', 'price': '100.00', 'revisions': 4, 'title': 'detailstest'}], 'title': 'Grafikdesign-Paket'}
PATCH_DATA = {'details': [{'features': ['patchfeature1', 'patchfeature2'], 'offer_type': 'basic', 'price': '768.00'}], 'title': 'titlepatch'}
QUERY_PARAMS = {'min_price': 200}
setUp()

Inherits the general setup for creating test data.

test_delete_offer_detail_no_content()

Tests successful deletion of an offer.

Asserts:

  • 204 No Content status.

test_get_offer_detail_ok()

Tests retrieval of specific offer details.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

test_get_offer_list_filter_ok()

Tests filtering of offer list by minimum price.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Retrieved offers satisfy minimum price condition.

test_get_offer_list_ok()

Tests retrieval of the list of offers.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Presence of pagination keys in response data.

test_patch_offer_detail_double_offer_type_validation_err()

Tests validation error for duplicate offer types in offer details update.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad Request status.

test_patch_offer_detail_double_title_unique_constraint()

Tests unique constraint on title during offer update.

Asserts:

  • 201 Created for new offer.

  • 409 Conflict when updating with duplicate title.

test_patch_offer_detail_missing_offer_type_validation_err()

Tests validation error for missing offer type in offer details update.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad Request status.

test_patch_offer_detail_ok()

Tests successful update of offer title and features in details.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Title and features are updated in the database.

test_post_offer_list_double_offer_type_validation_err()

Tests validation error for duplicate offer types in offer details.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad Request status.

test_post_offer_list_double_title_unique_constraint()

Tests unique constraint on title when creating an offer.

Asserts:

  • First creation succeeds (201 Created).

  • Second creation with same title fails (409 Conflict).

test_post_offer_list_ok()

Tests successful creation of an offer with multiple details.

Asserts:

  • 201 Created status.

  • Three details are included in the created offer.

content_app.tests.tests_orders module

class content_app.tests.tests_orders.General(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

General setup class for creating reusable test instances of customer users, profiles, tokens, and orders.

setUp()

Inherits offers tests general setup. Also creates a customer user, customer profile, and an order. Also configures the client with an authorization token for the customer user.

class content_app.tests.tests_orders.OrderTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Tests for Order endpoints, focusing on order creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion with permissions.

setUp()

Inherits the general setup for creating test data for orders.

test_delete_order_detail_as_creator_forbidden()

Tests deletion of an order by the creator (business user), expecting forbidden response.

Asserts:

  • 403 Forbidden status.

test_delete_order_detail_as_customer_forbidden()

Tests deletion of an order by the customer, expecting forbidden response.

Asserts:

  • 403 Forbidden status.

test_get_order_detail_ok()

Tests retrieval of specific order details.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Response data matches serialized order data.

  • ‘offer_type’ field is present in response.

  • ‘offer_detail_id’ and ‘offer_details’ fields are absent in response.

test_get_order_list_ok()

Tests retrieval of the list of orders.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

test_patch_order_detail_bad_request()

Tests updating an order with invalid field data, expecting a bad request response.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad Request status.

test_patch_order_detail_ok()

Tests updating an order status to ‘cancelled’ by an authorized business user.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Order status is updated to ‘cancelled’ in response.

  • ‘offer_type’ field is present in response.

  • ‘offer_detail_id’ and ‘offer_details’ fields are absent in response.

test_post_order_list_bad_request()

Tests order creation with invalid data, expecting a bad request response.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad Request status.

test_post_order_list_ok()

Tests successful creation of an order with basic offer details.

Asserts:

  • 201 Created status.

  • Order status is set to IN_PROGRESS.

  • ‘offer_type’ field is present in response.

  • ‘offer_detail_id’ and ‘offer_details’ fields are absent in response.

content_app.tests.tests_reviews module

class content_app.tests.tests_reviews.General(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

General setup class for creating reusable instances of users, profiles, orders, and reviews for testing.

setUp()

Inherits orders tests general setup. Also creates a customer review. Also sets up a second business user, profile, offer, and order for test flexibility.

class content_app.tests.tests_reviews.ReviewTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Tests for Review endpoints, covering review creation, retrieval, filtering, and deletion.

setUp()

Inherits setup from the General class, including test users, profiles, and reviews.

test_delete_review_detail_no_content()

Tests successful deletion of a review.

Asserts:

  • 204 No Content status.

test_get_review_detail_ok()

Tests retrieval of a specific review’s details.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Response data matches the serialized review data.

test_get_review_list_filter_ok()

Tests retrieval of reviews filtered by business user ID and reviewer ID.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Each review in the response data matches the requested filter criteria.

test_get_review_list_ok()

Tests successful retrieval of a list of reviews.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

test_post_review_list_missing_field_bad_request()

Tests review creation with a missing ‘rating’ field, expecting a bad request response.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad Request status.

test_post_review_list_ok()

Tests successful creation of a new review for a business.

Asserts:

  • 201 Created status.

  • The response includes ‘id’ and ‘reviewer’ fields.

test_post_review_list_unique_constraint_bad_request()

Tests review creation with a duplicate review for the same business, expecting a unique constraint violation.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad Request status.
